Our friendly on-site Broker and Sales Office is located behind the security gate, near the Welcome Center at the entrance to RiverBend Motorcoach Resort.  You can stop by the Welcome Center where someone will be at the front desk ready to assist you.
For specific questions, please call, or come by our Welcome Center or you may fill out the contact information form here and we will email you a response.
5800 West State Road 80
LaBelle, FL 33935
Local: 863-674-0085
Our Welcome Center is open daily October 10 – April 30
Monday – Friday:  8:00 am – 5:00 pm
Saturday: 9:00 am – 3:00 pm
Sunday: 9:00 am – 1:00 pm
Please call for summer hours, as these vary during off-peak season.
How to Get to RiverBend Motorcoach Resort
RiverBend Motorcoach Resort is conveniently located on FL-80, just west of the town of LaBelle, FL. Our resort is a quick drive from Fort Myers
and you can get to Southwest Florida International Airport in about 30 minutes, or Punta Gorda Airport in about 40 minutes
. You can find detailed driving instructions on Google Maps and our GPS coordinates are: N26.42.5997, W81.31.9229.
From Southwest Florida International Airport/Fort Myers area:
Take I-75 North 10.5 miles to FL-80 East
Stay on FL-80 East/Palm Beach Blvd for 17.3 miles, toward LaBelle, FL. As you enter Hendry County, you will see the entrance to our resort on the North side of FL-80, before you reach the town of LaBelle proper.
